name: nuxt-app
_comment0: Some error when adding i18n told me to add type: module. But that didn't remove the error
_comment1: TODO: Change i18n version from next to ^8.0.0 once there's a stable v8 release. We used next so it would update through rc versions.
_comments_on_scripts: 1. Calling it 'upload', bc 'deploy' seems to be reserved in pnpm
2. To test deployment version, run `generate`, then follow instructions in terminal to serve locally.
